findings.title: Solidity version must be fixed
findings.description: The solidity version should be fixed to ensure consistency between development and deployment phases.

findings.title: Deprecated Constructor Declaration
findings.description: Constructor of Contract ownable.sol is declared as of its contract name-function ownable(), declaring constructor as a same name of function is deprecated use constructor().

findings.title: Invoking event without 'emit' prefix is deprecated
findings.description: Invoking events without using the 'emit' prefix is deprecated and should be replaced with the 'emit' prefix.

findings.title: Always use access modifier public/private/external/internal while declaring functions
findings.description: Six functions in DigipharmToken.sol contract do not contain access modifiers.
